column4: hi all :D  i was to install FAM package via apt-get when installer begin to uninstall almost everything, i managed to ctrl+c it at time BUT most metacity themes that come with ubuntu by default are now gone, how can I do to RESTORE them? =P
you'll have to do a complete removal of teh metacity package and then reinstall it
if this does happen apt-get install ubuntu-desktop
the metacity package is part of ubuntu-desktop, am I correct?
